description: Cabernet`s Futachimaru was the first Pok√©mon that Cabernet sent out to battle Cilan with in her first revenge battle near the Friendly Shop just outside of Hiun City. Cabernet`s Futachimaru faced Cilan`s Ishizumai but its Water attacks proved useless against it. It didn`t last too long against Cilan`s Ishizumai as Cabernet was unable to adjust her battle strategy to counter Cilan`s Ishizumai good defenses.
name: Futachimaru (Cabernet)
